Structures¶

Structures used by GridProtocol to layout 1 & 2D simulations.

class PyLongQt.Structures.Fiber¶

A 1D row/column of nodes in a Grid

__getitem__(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Fiber, index: int) → PyLongQt.Structures.Node¶

Get a node by index

__iter__(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Fiber) → iterator¶

Iterate over nodes

updateVm(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Fiber, arg0: float) → None¶

Update voltages for all nodes. Calls Cell.updateVm()

class PyLongQt.Structures.Grid¶

A 2D plane of nodes, which provides the layout for 1 and 2 dimentional simulations

__getitem__(*args, **kwargs)¶

Overloaded function.

  1. __getitem__(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, arg0: Tuple[int, int]) -> PyLongQt.Structures.Node

Retrieve node by its (row, column)

  1. __getitem__(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, arg0: List[Tuple[int, int]]) -> List[PyLongQt.Structures.Node]

Retrieve nodes by thier [(row, column),…]

__iter__(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid) → iterator¶

Iterate over nodes

addColumn(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid) → None¶

Add a single column of cells

addColumns(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, num: int) → None¶
Add multiple columns of cells
num:the number of rows to add
addRow(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid) → None¶

Add a single row of cells

addRows(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, num: int) → None¶
Add multiple rows of cells
num:the number of rows to add
columnCount(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid) → int¶

The number of columns

dx¶

The length of each node in the grid

dy¶

The width of each cell in the grid

findNode(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, node: PyLongQt.Structures.Node) → Tuple[int, int]¶
Find a node’s location in the grid
node:The node object to locate
getColumn(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, index: int) → PyLongQt.Structures.Fiber¶
Retrieve a column of nodes by thier index
index:The location of the column
getRow(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, index: int) → PyLongQt.Structures.Fiber¶
Retrieve a row of nodes by thier index
index:The location of the row
np¶

WHAT IS THIS

removeColumn(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, index: int) → None¶
Remove one column of cells
index:the location of the column to remove
removeColumns(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, num: int, index: int) → None¶
Remove multiple columns of cells
num:the number of columns including index to be removed
index:the location of the first column to remove
removeRow(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, index: int) → None¶
Remove one row of cells
index:the location of the row to remove
removeRows(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid, num: int, index: int) → None¶
Remove multiple rows of cells
num:the number of rows including index to be removed
index:the location of the first row to remove
reset(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid) → None¶

Reset the grid to original state

rowCount(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Grid) → int¶

The number of rows

shape¶

The shape of the grid (rows, columns)

class PyLongQt.Structures.Node¶

The wrapper for a single cell in a multi-dimensional simulation

cell¶

The cell contained in the node

getCondConst(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Node, side: PyLongQt.Side) → float¶
Get the conductivity of a side
side:The side to get
setCondConst(self: PyLongQt.Structures.Node, side: PyLongQt.Side, perc: bool = True, value: float = 1) → None¶
Set the conductivity (what are the units) of a side to a value
side:The side to set
perc:If the value is a precentage or raw
value:The value
